capture_screenshot.description: Take a screenshot of a web page

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the page to capture

props.name: imageType
props.description: Format of the screenshot image

props.name: quality
props.description: Image quality (0-100, only for JPEG)

props.name: fullPage
props.description: Capture the full scrollable page

props.name: width
props.description: Width of the browser viewport in pixels

props.name: height
props.description: Height of the browser viewport in pixels

props.name: waitForSelector
props.description: CSS selector to wait for before taking screenshot

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay in milliseconds before taking screenshot

props.name: omitBackground
props.description: Hide default white background for transparent screenshots

props.name: clipX
props.description: X coordinate of the top-left corner for clipping

props.name: clipY
props.description: Y coordinate of the top-left corner for clipping

props.name: clipWidth
props.description: Width of the clipping area

props.name: clipHeight
props.description: Height of the clipping area

generate_pdf.description: Convert a web page to PDF

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the page to convert to PDF

props.name: html
props.description: HTML content to render as PDF (alternative to URL)

props.name: format
props.description: Paper format for the PDF

props.name: landscape
props.description: Use landscape orientation

props.name: printBackground
props.description: Include background graphics

props.name: marginTop
props.description: Top margin (e.g., "10mm", "0.4in")

props.name: marginRight
props.description: Right margin (e.g., "10mm", "0.4in")

props.name: marginBottom
props.description: Bottom margin (e.g., "10mm", "0.4in")

props.name: marginLeft
props.description: Left margin (e.g., "10mm", "0.4in")

props.name: headerTemplate
props.description: HTML template for the print header

props.name: footerTemplate
props.description: HTML template for the print footer

props.name: displayHeaderFooter
props.description: Display header and footer

props.name: scale
props.description: Scale of the webpage rendering (0.1 - 2.0)

props.name: waitForSelector
props.description: CSS selector to wait for before generating PDF

props.name: waitForSelectorTimeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds for waiting for selector

props.name: waitForSelectorVisible
props.description: Wait for selector to be visible

props.name: waitForSelectorHidden
props.description: Wait for selector to be hidden

props.name: preferCSSPageSize
props.description: Give any CSS @page size declared in the page priority over format

props.name: pageRanges
props.description: Paper ranges to print, e.g. "1-5, 8, 11-13"

props.name: width
props.description: Custom width of paper (e.g., "8.5in", "210mm")

props.name: height
props.description: Custom height of paper (e.g., "11in", "297mm")

props.name: omitBackground
props.description: Hide default white background and allow transparent PDFs

props.name: tagged
props.description: Generate tagged (accessible) PDF

props.name: outline
props.description: Generate document outline

props.name: timeout
props.description: Maximum time to wait for the page to load

props.name: waitForFunction
props.description: JavaScript function to wait for before generating PDF

props.name: waitForFunctionPolling
props.description: Polling interval for wait function ("raf", "mutation", or number in ms)

props.name: waitForFunctionTimeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds for wait function (0 to disable)

props.name: userAgent
props.description: Custom user agent string to use for the request

props.name: waitForTimeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds to wait before generating PDF

props.name: bestAttempt
props.description: Attempt to proceed when awaited events fail or timeout

get_website_performance.description: Analyze website performance metrics using Lighthouse

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the website to analyze

props.name: categories
props.description: Select which performance categories to analyze (performance, accessibility, best-practices, seo, pwa)

props.name: device
props.description: Device type for performance analysis

props.name: throttling
props.description: Network throttling simulation

props.name: onlyCategories
props.description: Return only category scores without detailed audit results

props.name: locale
props.description: Locale for the analysis (e.g., en-US, de-DE)

props.name: userAgent
props.description: Custom user agent string

props.name: timeout
props.description: Maximum time to wait for the analysis to complete

props.name: waitForSelector
props.description: CSS selector to wait for before running performance analysis

props.name: emulateMediaType
props.description: Emulate CSS media type

props.name: budgets
props.description: Lighthouse performance budgets for resource sizes

props.name: resourceType
props.description: Type of resource to budget

props.name: budget
props.description: Maximum allowed size in kilobytes

props.name: stealth
props.description: Enable stealth mode for bot detection bypass

props.name: blockAds
props.description: Enable ad blocker during performance analysis

run_bql_query.description: Execute Browser Query Language (BQL) GraphQL-based queries for advanced browser automation

props.name: query
props.description: GraphQL-based BQL query for browser automation. Example: mutation { goto(url: "https://example.com") { status } }

props.name: variables
props.description: Variables to pass to the BQL query (JSON object)

props.name: operationName
props.description: Name of the GraphQL operation to execute

props.name: timeout
props.description: Maximum execution time in milliseconds

props.name: stealth
props.description: Enable stealth mode for bot detection bypass

props.name: headless
props.description: Run browser in headless mode (set to false for GUI)

props.name: humanlike
props.description: Enable human-like mouse movement, typing, and delays

props.name: proxy
props.description: Type of proxy to use

props.name: proxyCountry
props.description: Country code for residential proxy (e.g., us, gb, de)

props.name: proxySticky
props.description: Maintain same proxy IP across session

props.name: blockAds
props.description: Enable ad blocker (uBlock Origin)

props.name: blockConsentModals
props.description: Automatically block/dismiss cookie consent banners

props.name: record
props.description: Enable session recording for debugging

props.name: slowMo
props.description: Add delays between browser actions in milliseconds

props.name: ignoreHTTPSErrors
props.description: Ignore HTTPS certificate errors during navigation

props.name: userAgent
props.description: Custom user agent string

props.name: viewportWidth
props.description: Browser viewport width

props.name: viewportHeight
props.description: Browser viewport height

props.name: cookies
props.description: Cookies to set before executing BQL query

props.name: url
props.description: Request-URI to associate with the cookie

props.name: secure
props.description: Indicates if the cookie is secure

props.name: httpOnly
props.description: Indicates if the cookie is HTTP-only

props.name: sameSite
props.description: SameSite policy for the cookie

props.name: expires
props.description: Expiration date as timestamp (session cookie if not set)

scrape_url.description: Extract content from a web page

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the page to scrape

props.name: elements
props.description: CSS selectors for elements to extract

props.name: selector
props.description: CSS selector for the element

props.name: timeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds for this specific selector

props.name: waitForSelector
props.description: CSS selector to wait for before scraping

props.name: waitForSelectorTimeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds for waiting for selector

props.name: waitForSelectorVisible
props.description: Wait for selector to be visible

props.name: waitForSelectorHidden
props.description: Wait for selector to be hidden

props.name: waitForTimeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds to wait before scraping

props.name: waitForEvent
props.description: Event name to wait for before scraping

props.name: waitForEventTimeout
props.description: Timeout in milliseconds for wait event

props.name: debugConsole
props.description: Include console logs in debug output

props.name: debugCookies
props.description: Include cookies in debug output

props.name: debugNetwork
props.description: Include network requests in debug output

props.name: bestAttempt
props.description: Attempt to proceed when awaited events fail or timeout

props.name: userAgent
props.description: Custom user agent string

props.name: cookies
props.description: Cookies to set before scraping

props.name: timeout
props.description: Maximum time to wait for the page to load

props.name: waitUntil
props.description: When to consider navigation complete

props.name: waitForFunction
props.description: JavaScript function to wait for before scraping (should return true when ready)

props.name: viewportWidth
props.description: Browser viewport width in pixels

props.name: viewportHeight
props.description: Browser viewport height in pixels
